DOC.brief_summary: To determine topical negative pressure therapy deliver V.A.C.® device clinically efficacious cost effective treatment diabetic foot ulcer . The purpose study compare effectiveness V.A.C.® Therapy moist wound therapy diabetic foot ulcer . The primary objective determine effect V.A.C.® Therapy incidence complete wound closure . Secondary objective include : evaluating acceleration ulcer closure facilitation surgical closure , reduction ulcer surface area time , reduction complication , quality life average total cost care .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized , Controlled Multicenter Trial Vacuum Assisted Closure Therapy™ Diabetic Foot Ulcers
